translated: “Venerable, because I relied on you, Venerable Udayī, as a spiritual teacher, you have done for me

analyzed: mas kyang ma bgyis /

analyzed: rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis /

analyzed: dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /

analyzed: byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /

original: thob ste / btsun pa /

translated: I have entered into it, reverend.

analyzed: bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol //

original: tshur shog / ngal sos shig /

original: khyod kyi pha de 'ongs sam /

original: bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang / @85a *//
analyzed: bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang / @85a *//

original: gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des smras pa /
analyzed: gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des smras pa /

analyzed: rje'i sras / byon pa legs so //

original: byon pa legs so //
analyzed: byon pa legs so //

analyzed: 'di ltar sngon dang mi 'dra bar //

original: gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
analyzed: gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /

analyzed: myos par gyur pa'ang ma lags te // bdag gis sangs rgyas bstan pa la //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bgyis //

analyzed: rje'i sras / bdag la 'phags pa 'char kas 'di ltar /

analyzed: bram ze de de ngo mtshar skyes te bsam pa /

analyzed: btsun pa 'char kas chos bstan pas btul bas /

analyzed: gang gi phyir chos bstan pas 'di btul ba ni / 'phags pa 'char kas bdag la phan pa mang du mdzad do //

analyzed: 'phags pa 'char kas bdag la legs pa mang du mdzad kyi /

analyzed: @85b mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed /

analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed / yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed /

analyzed: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi smra'o //

translated: Then the brahmin rose from his seat, went to Venerable Udayin, bowed down with his head at his feet, and said to Venerable Udayin,

analyzed: btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so //
translated: Venerable Udayin assented to the brahmin by his silence.

original: de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //

translated: Then the brahmin, knowing that Venerable Udayin had assented by his silence, bowed down at his feet, circumambulated him three times, and left.

analyzed: de nas bram ze des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos /

analyzed: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /

analyzed: rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod @86a *//

analyzed: pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal /

analyzed: lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
translated: he took a very low seat and sat before the venerable Udayi in order to listen to the Dharma.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar /🔽bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar / bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
translated: Venerable Udayin, knowing his thoughts, dispositions, nature, and character,🔽taught him the Dharma accordingly.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to //
translated: As the brahmin sat there, he destroyed with the thunderbolt of wisdom the twenty high peaks of the mountain of views concerning the transitory collection,🔽and manifested the resultant state of stream entry right where he sat.

analyzed: de dag gis de thos nas smras pa /

analyzed: rgan mo ci zer /

original: rgan mo des smras pa /

analyzed: cang mi zer ro //
